steps: Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Editing' group, click on the 'Find' button.
In the 'Find and Replace' dialog box, enter the word you want to find in the 'Find what' field.
Click on the 'Find Next' button to search for the word.
If the word is found, it will be highlighted in the document. You can click on 'Find Next' again to find the next occurrence of the word.
If the word is not found, a message will be displayed indicating that the word was not found.
Close the 'Find and Replace' dialog box.
